2114.subject: CST
2114.descrlong: Provides both the strategic and technical essentials of designing, developing and management of an e-Commerce initiative. The course starts with a survey of the landscape of e-Commerce technologies and how business employs them to gain competitive advantages. The course then delves into the step-by-step process of design and development of e-Commerce systems.Â  Students gain hands-on experience using hardware and system software, and learn various technology and design issues by building a fully functional prototype of an e-Commerce site. The course finishes with issues and practice of management, maintaining and updating the e-Commerce site. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
